seewhatsnew: Find out what's new since you were here last time
seephotos: Browse photos of past activities in {communityName}
nowhatsnew: Sorry, there are no news in {communityName} at this time.
noactivities: Sorry, there are no activities planned in {communityName}.
nophotos: Sorry, there are no photos from past events in {communityName}.
numberofgroups: {numGroups, plural, =0 {No groups yet} =1 {One group} other {# groups}}
numberofmembers: {numMembers, plural, =0 {No one yet} =1 {One person} other {# people}}
numberofphotos: {numPhotos, plural, =0 {No photos yet} =1 {One photo} other {# photos}}
news-changedtime: Careful, {personName} changed the starting time of {activityName}!
